subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: David Beckham will be officially introduced as the newest member of the Los Angeles Galaxy on July 13 at the team’s stadium in Carson, Calif.Beckham will arrive in Los Angeles a few days before his introductory news conference and first training session with the M.L.S. team. Beckham is expected to make his Galaxy debut in an exhibition against Chelsea on July 21 at Home Depot Center.
